title: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is Investigating the Board of Directors of Ply Gem Holdings, Inc. (PGEM) on Behalf of Stockholders and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is investigating potential claims on behalf of Ply Gem Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:PGEM) stockholders concerning the proposed acquisition of the company by Clayton, Dubilier & Rice.
Our investigation concerns whether Ply Gemâ€™s board of directors failed to adequately shop the company and obtain the best possible value for its stockholders before entering into a definitive merger agreement with CD&R. Under the terms of the agreement, Ply Gem stockholders will receive $21.64 per share in cash. Following entry into the agreement, stockholders holding greater than 50% of the outstanding shares of Ply Gem common stock executed a written consent to approve the transaction.
If you own Ply Gem shares, have information, would like to learn more about these claims, or have any questions concerning this announcement or your rights or interests with respect to these matters, please contact Brandon Walker or Melissa Fortunato by email at investigations@bespc.com , or telephone at (212) 355-4648, or by filling out this contact form . There is no cost or obligation to you.
Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is a New York-based law firm concentrating in commercial and securities litigation. For additional information concerning our investigation of Ply Gem Holdings, Inc., please go to http://www.bespc.com/plygem .
